meanings.definition: Microscopic organisms that can cause disease or aid in digestion.
meanings.sent1: The bacteria in the pond are so tiny you can't see them without a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antibiotics to fight harmful bacteria in our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria at the party were the life of the microscopic dance floor.
meanings.sent4: In a world of bacteria, our immune system is the brave knight protecting the castle.
meanings.sent5: The bacteria multiplied rapidly, like a tiny army invading a kingdom.

meanings.sent1: There are many different types of bacteria living in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied various bacteria under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria gathered for a tiny convention to discuss their microscopic problems.
meanings.sent4: The bacteria in the petri dish were like stars in a tiny galaxy.
meanings.sent5: The bacteria formed a colorful mosaic, each one playing a vital role.
